sourcesContent: import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from '../project'; import { PROJECTS } from '../projects'; import { PROJECT_SKILLS } from '../projects'; @Component({ selector: 'app-portfolio', templateUrl: './portfolio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./portfolio.component.css'] }) export class PortfolioComponent { static readonly projects: Project[] = PROJECTS; static readonly filters: string[] = PROJECT_SKILLS; // filters: Array = ["Windows","MacOS","Android","iOS","Web Browser","Python", // "C#","Java","JavaScript","TypeScript","SQL","HTML/CSS","Angular","Bootstrap","Design","Unity","2D","3D"]; filtered_item: string = ""; filtered_projects: Project[] = PortfolioComponent.projects; skills_filter: Set = new Set(); platforms_filter: Set = new Set(); languages_filter: Set = new Set(); constructor() {} ngOnInit() { // this.getFiltersFromProjects(); } @HostListener('document:click', ['$event']) documentClick(event: MouseEvent) { // this.projects.pop(); } filter($event: string) { if($event == ""){ return; } this.filtered_item = $event; //event emitted by filters component // console.log(this.filtered_item); // this.remove_project(this.filtered_item); } checkUndefined(item: any) { if (item === undefined) { throw new Error(item + " is undefined!"); } return item; } arrayToSet(array: string[], set: Set) { for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { set.add(array[i]); } return set; } remove_project(item: string) { for (let i = 0; i < PortfolioComponent.projects.length; i++) { // let project_skills: Map = this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"]; // console.log(project_skills); } } }
